description: Aryx Quinn seems like a great guy.  That's why Cody is taking the time to show him around and make him feel comfortable.  After all, shooting a scene with the Italian Stallion himself can mean a lot of pressure for a newbie.  Luckily, Aryx is using the opportunity to showcase his excellent cock sucking skills.  This one is two muscular dudes hanging out, just doing guy shit.  And Aryx won't soon forget his big debut with the legendary Cody Cummings!Enjoy!
title: Cody gets a BJ from a newbie
